effect.black_white: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user’s Special Attack by two stages.
effect.black_2_white_2: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user’s Special Attack by two stages.

short_effect.black_white: Lowers the user’s Special Attack by two stages after inflicting damage.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: Lowers the user’s Special Attack by two stages after inflicting damage.

flavor_text.black_white: The user whips up a storm of leaves around the target. The attack’s recoil harshly reduces the user’s Sp. Atk stat.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user whips up a storm of leaves around the target. The attack’s recoil harshly reduces the user’s Sp. Atk stat.
